QuestData.Title: Bubble Trouble
QuestData.Description: $C! The sea giants have already eaten half of my kin.$B$BWe are helpless in these accursed bubbles. I beseech you to get us out of here.$B$BTake heed. These bubbles are strong. You will need something that is extremely sharp to pierce them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a piece of Needle Coral and then rescue 5 Captured Vrykul in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Move quickly, $c! These sea giants have an insatiable appetite!
QuestData.RewardText: There is no glory or honor in being digested.
